Package game.actions.skills

Class QuickstepAction

java.lang.Object
game.engine.actions.Action
game.actions.skills.QuickstepAction
public class QuickstepAction
extends Action
An Action to attack another Actor and move to the closest available exit.
Author:
Ziheng Liao Modified by: Harshath Muruganantham
